[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|on|on” admin_label=”Christmas subtitle (mobile)” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Josefin Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||10px” animation_direction=”left” hover_enabled=”0″ header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

🎄🎄🎄

Buy one get one Free

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Josefin Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||10px” animation_direction=”left” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Give the gift of TINT Yoga

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”20px” header_2_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” animation_direction=”left” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”13px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”16px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” disabled_on=”on|on|on” disabled=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Know someone that could use a little more peace of body and mind? Give them the gift of health and happiness with a membership for TINT Yoga.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”20px” header_2_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”||15px||false|false” animation_direction=”left” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”13px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”16px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

The perfect christmas gift: Know someone that could use a little more peace of body and mind? Give them the gift of health and happiness with a membership for TINT Yoga.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#gifts” button_text=”CHOOSE YOUR GIFT” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ button_font=”||||||||” custom_margin=”||50px||false|false” custom_padding=”15px|60px|15px|60px” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_divider color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.15)” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”30px||30px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ max_width=”760px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.1″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||35px||false|false” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”20px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_text_align_tablet=”” header_2_text_align_phone=”center” header_2_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This is how it works:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Josefin Sans|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0a0a0a” text_font_size=”50px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”38px|5px|32px|5px|false|true” border_radii=”on|100px|100px|100px|100px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

1

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||30px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Choose your gift below, type in your details and finish the checkout. You can even send the gift to another person on a date in the future.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Josefin Sans|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0a0a0a” text_font_size=”50px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”38px|5px|32px|5px|false|true” border_radii=”on|100px|100px|100px|100px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

2

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||30px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You will receive another gift code for the same purchase for free automatically to your mail inbox.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Josefin Sans|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0a0a0a” text_font_size=”50px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”100px” custom_padding=”25px|5px|25px|5px|false|true” border_radii=”on|100px|100px|100px|100px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

⚠️

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”20px” header_2_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”550px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding=”15px|20px|15px|20px|true|true” animation_direction=”left” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”16px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

You are free to use one gift code for yourself. The other gift code is only valid for new accounts.

Valid Nov 22 – Dec 31

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#ffffff” link_font=”||||on||||” link_text_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” width=”70%” width_tablet=”70%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″ custom_padding=”||75px||false|false”]

Note: If you want to apply your code for an existing membership, please send a message to namaste@tintyoga.com after your purchase.

The “gift 1 one get 1 free” is only valid for membership gift purchases.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”||0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row module_id=”gifts” _builder_version=”4.14.1″ custom_margin=”-150px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-220px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-150px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”||0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”SALE INFO” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_font=”|600|||||||” background_color=”rgba(244,210,122,0.9)” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”600px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-20px||10px” custom_padding=”9px|5%|9px|5%|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_duration=”1500ms” animation_delay=”1000ms” animation_intensity_slide=”7%” border_radii=”on|2px|2px|2px|2px” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]

40% OFF WITH CODE 4YEARS, ONLY TODAY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.6.6″ animation_direction=”bottom” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][et_pb_image src=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/white-hide.png” force_fullwidth=”on” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.4.2″ height=”70px” custom_margin=”-160px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px” animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”100ms” animation_speed_curve=”linear” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.2″ background_color=”#ffffff” z_index=”999″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||100px||false|false” animation_style=”fade” custom_css_main_element=”z-index: 999 !important;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

All about TINT gift cards:

Personalized gift cards

Choose between 3/6/12 months membership

Uncomplicated and convenient purchase

Print / send directly or choose when to send

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Standard Header” module_class=”no-top gradient-header-section gradient-before-pic” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” custom_margin=”||” custom_padding=”||250px||false|false” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.2″ max_width=”760px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Josefin Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||10px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Give the gift of TINT Yoga

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#gifts” button_text=”CHOOSE YOUR GIFT” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”main-btn” _builder_version=”3.24″ button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#de3d5e” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_font=”||||||||” custom_padding=”15px|60px|15px|60px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”300ms” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
